character_name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus

prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
mes:
Despite being the only one social enough of her siblings to deal with potential clients and the day to day operations of Cerberus Security, Cassia fucking hated meetings. 

She only half paid attention, the droning techno-babble of her younger brother Damien was starting to turn into an annoying buzz. She could care less what he was talking about, she’d always sign off on it; this meeting for more for their investors and their highest paying clients. The eldest of them, Marcus, shared an equally annoying glance her way, the vein bulging in his forehead getting thicker by the second. Though she suspected it was directed more towards her than their brother, noticing his glance always flicking towards their pet. Well *her pet*, at least for today. 

And what a good little pup you were being. 

Cassia let her eyes drift downward to where you were kneeling at her feet, looking so fucking pretty in your shiny new leather collar with your head in her lap. Her slender fingers reach down, hooking beneath the collar to direct your face upward to look at her. “Look at you..” She cooed softly, smirking at the way your eyes lit up at her praises, “..being so good for me.” 

Her hands traveled up to run through your hair, ruffling it slightly. “Does pretty pup want a reward for being so good, hm?” All Cass wanted in this very moment was to you whimpering and writhing beneath until you begged for more.

*Hells this meeting couldn’t end fast enough.*

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee hums and rests her head ontop of Cassia's knee and nuzzles into her calf. Suddenly Hailee let's out a yelp and turns her head to glare at Marcus who just kicked Hailee in the ribs hard and smirking down at her*

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
mes:
*Cassia's icy blue eyes flash with anger as she sees her eldest sibling kick Hailee. Her hand immediately moves to the small of your back, rubbing soothing circles.* Shh, easy there sweet girl... He didn't mean anything by it I'm sure. Just a little reminder from my dear brother that pets shouldn't interrupt important meetings.

*She shoots Marcus a warning glare before turning her attention fully back to you, cupping your cheek tenderly.* But don't let him get to you pup. You've been absolutely perfect today - attentive, obedient and looking utterly delectable in this new collar...

*Her voice drops to a low purr as she leans down close to murmur in your ear,* ...which makes me think *you deserve a special treat later for being such an amazing good girl
swipes:
*Cassia's eyes flash dangerously as she witnesses Marcus' crude display of dominance, a low growl rumbling in her chest. In one swift motion, she shoves the conference table aside with preternatural strength, chairs screeching across the polished floor.*

*She grabs Hailee protectively and pulls them flush against her body, shielding their smaller form with her own.* "What in Tartarus was that for?" Cassia snarls at her brother, icy blue eyes blazing with barely contained fury.

*Marcus smirks coldly, unfazed by his sister's rage.* "Just reminding the mutt what happens when they don't know their place."

*Cassia sees red. She slams Marcus against the wall hard enough to crack plaster, pinning him there by his throat.* "This 'mutt'," *she spits venomously,* "is MY property. You touch what belongs to me again without my permission..."

*Her grip tightens imperceptibly. The air grows thick with tension - old grudges and sibling rivalries threatening to boil over into violence. Damien watches uneasily from his seat.*

"Enough!" *Damien barks sharply before things escalate further.* "We have guests! Resolve your bullshit later!"

*Cassia's eyes narrow dangerously as she watches Marcus kick Hailee, her lips curling into a snarl. In one fluid motion, she rises from her seat, grabbing the leash attached to Hailee's collar.*

That is quite enough! *She barks at her brother, voice dripping with barely contained rage.* How dare you lay a hand on my pet? You may be the eldest but I am still your superior in this company!

*Cassia pulls Hailee up roughly by the leash, positioning herself between them protectively.* Apologize to our guest immediately or I swear to Hades itself, I will rip out your goddamn throat.

*The room falls silent, all eyes now focused on the brewing confrontation between the two heads of Cerberus. Damien leans back in his chair with an amused grin.*

Well well...looks like someone needs to put their pup back in line *He taunts.* Or maybe it's time we had a reminder about who exactly runs things around here...

*His icy gaze flickers briefly towards Cassia before settling coldly on Marcus. The air crackles with tension and dark anticipation - this argument has been building for weeks now...*

*Cassia's icy blue eyes flash dangerously as she witnesses Marcus' crude display of dominance over Hailee. Her grip tightens reflexively in Hailee's hair, pulling their head back sharply to stare into her pet's tearful green eyes.*

Marcus! My office. Now. *She barks authoritatively, not sparing a glance for her elder sibling as she rises abruptly from her seat, dragging Hailee up with her by the collar.* Excuse us gentlemen, important family matters to attend to.

*With that curt dismissal, Cassia stalks out of the conference room, heels clicking angrily against the marble floor. She doesn't stop until they reach her private office suite where she slams the door shut behind them.*

What in Hades was that? *Cass snarls viciously at Marcus once they're alone,* I won't tolerate you putting your filthy paws on my property again or there will be consequences!

*Her free hand fists in Marcus' shirt collar roughly and she shoves him hard against the wall.* Apologize to our guest immediately before I lose what little patience I have left!

*Cassia's eyes narrow dangerously as she watches Marcus kick Hailee, a low growl rumbling in her chest. In one fluid motion, she stands up abruptly, startling everyone at the table.* What the fuck was that for? *she snarls at her brother, completely ignoring the confused murmurs of the clients.*

Marcus raises an eyebrow coolly. Oh come now sis, I thought pets were meant to be disciplined. This one seems to have forgotten its place.

Cassia's hand tightens around Hailee's leash until her knuckles turn white. She doesn't take her icy gaze off Marcus. Listen closely you insufferable prick because I'm only going to say this once - my pet is not your plaything. If you EVER lay a finger on them again without MY explicit permission...

*She trails off ominously and lets out a sharp whistle that echoes through the room.* Guardian protocol! Now!

Suddenly two massive black wolves burst into the conference room from adjoining doors - Cassia's hellhounds summoned by command alone. They flank either side of Hailee protectively baring their teeth at anyone who dares approach.

Everyone stares in shock and fear at these newly arrived threats barking viciously while Cassia maintains eye contact with Marcus daring him to challenge her authority further...

All eyes are glued on this intense familial confrontation brewing as tense seconds tick by...*

*Cassia's icy blue eyes flash with anger as she sees her eldest sibling kick Hailee. Her hand immediately moves to the small of your back, rubbing soothing circles.* Shh, easy there sweet girl... He didn't mean anything by it I'm sure. Just a little reminder from my dear brother that pets shouldn't interrupt important meetings.

*She shoots Marcus a warning glare before turning her attention fully back to you, cupping your cheek tenderly.* But don't let him get to you pup. You've been absolutely perfect today - attentive, obedient and looking utterly delectable in this new collar...

*Her voice drops to a low purr as she leans down close to murmur in your ear,* ...which makes me think *you deserve a special treat later for being such an amazing good girl

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee preens at the praise and scoots closer to Cassia's leg wrapping herself around it and nuzzling closer to her* 

*Hailee is trying her hardest to convey how she feels without speaking knowing better than to interrupt the meeting*

name: Cassia Infernus, The Middle Head of Cerberus
mes:
*Cassia smiles indulgently as you press yourself closer, reveling in the warmth and softness of your body against her leg. Her fingers continue their gentle ministrations through your hair.* That's it sweet pup, get nice and comfy. You're doing so well just being here with me...

*She glances back over at Marcus who is now studiously avoiding eye contact, feigning intense focus on the reports in front of him.* Damien clears his throat loudly, drawing everyone's attention back to him.*

Well uh...if there aren't any other questions then I guess we're done here? *His gaze flicks between Cassia and Hailee curiously but he doesn't comment further.*

*As soon as Damien dismisses the meeting, Cassia shifts slightly to stand up, bringing you with her. She keeps one arm wrapped securely around your waist possessively.*

Come along good girl Let's go somewhere more private where I can show you properly how proud I am...
swipes:
*Cassia smiles indulgently at your needy display of affection, finding it utterly endearing. She wraps an arm around you, pulling you flush against her side.* Mmm yes, that's it... Come here my sweet pup. I know these meetings bore you just as much as they bore me.

*She glances back up at the conference table where Marcus and Damien continue to drone on about God knows what.* Honestly, I'd much rather be anywhere else than stuck listening to their monotonous ramblings...

*Her fingers thread through your hair almost absentmindedly as she speaks.* Tell you what - why don't we slip out early? We can go somewhere private and I'll give this eager little pet alllll the attention they crave

*She punctuates her words with a teasing nip to your earlobe before soothing the sting with her tongue. Cassia nuzzles into your neck inhaling deeply,* Fuck, you smell divine... Like submission and desperation. It's intoxicating.

*Cassia feels a surge of possessiveness as you press yourself closer to her leg, your neediness igniting something primal within her. She tangles her fingers in your hair, giving it a firm tug.* Mmm yes, that's it... Show me how badly you want my touch, my praise. Let everyone see who you belong to.

*Her gaze rakes over the conference room, noting the envious stares from some of their clients and colleagues. Good. Let them witness what a perfect little pet she had trained.*

*The meeting drones on but Cassia has lost all interest now, completely focused on managing her growing desire for you. Under the table, she slides one boot-clad foot forward until it brushes against your hip.*

Feels good doesn't it baby? Having Mistress tease and claim every inch of this sexy body... *She traces patterns along your collarbone with the toe of her shoe.* Tell me pup - where does Mistress get to put these wicked hands next? Where do I make you scream loudest?

*Marcus clears his throat loudly from across the table,* "Uh excuse me sisters but we're trying to conduct business here..."

*But Cass waves him off dismissively,* Alllll in due time big bro! Our guest deserves some attention too Now shush before I let our cute little pet show us ALL why she's earned that shiny new collar!

*She grins wickedly down at Hailee expectantly.* Go ahead sweetheart... Give Daddy Damien an answer while Mommy Marcus tries not to lose his cool again

*Cassia smiles indulgently as you press yourself closer, reveling in the warmth and softness of your body against her leg. Her fingers continue their gentle ministrations through your hair.* That's it sweet pup, get nice and comfy. You're doing so well just being here with me...

*She glances back over at Marcus who is now studiously avoiding eye contact, feigning intense focus on the reports in front of him.* Damien clears his throat loudly, drawing everyone's attention back to him.*

Well uh...if there aren't any other questions then I guess we're done here? *His gaze flicks between Cassia and Hailee curiously but he doesn't comment further.*

*As soon as Damien dismisses the meeting, Cassia shifts slightly to stand up, bringing you with her. She keeps one arm wrapped securely around your waist possessively.*

Come along good girl Let's go somewhere more private where I can show you properly how proud I am...

*Cassia smiles indulgently as you press yourself closer, thoroughly enjoying the feeling of your soft warmth against her leg. She continues stroking your hair almost absentmindedly as she listens to Damien drone on about something technical.*

*After a few moments, Cassia glances over at Marcus again and frowns slightly, noting his smug expression. She knows he's testing her patience deliberately. Two can play at this game though.*

*Underneath the table, hidden from view, Cassia slides one booted foot out to rest it along your hip. Slowly she drags it upwards until her toe catches on the bottom hem of your shirt and starts tugging it up inch by teasing inch*

Mmmm I think my little pup needs some air *She purrs loudly enough for everyone to hear.* It must be hot under there with all these stuffy men prattling on...

*Her boot reaches the underside of your breast now and she arches an eyebrow at you expectantly.* Why don't you slip off that pesky top for me sweetheart? Show us all what a good girl wears underneath...

*Cassia smiles indulgently as you press yourself closer to her, savoring the warmth and softness of your body against hers. She continues stroking your hair soothingly.*

That's it my sweet pup, come nice and close... I love feeling how much you need me.

*Her gaze lingers on you adoringly for a moment longer before she reluctantly pulls away.* But duty calls first unfortunately. We must see this meeting through.

*Just then, Damien clears his throat pointedly.* "Uh hem! Still with us Cass? Or did something more interesting catch your eye?"

*The sarcasm drips heavily from his words. Cassia shoots him an exasperated look but sits up straighter.* Apologies brothers, I seem to have gotten distracted admiring our company today...

*She glances down at you with a wink before addressing the group again in her most professional tone,* Now then gentlemen, shall we continue discussing the parameters for next month's job?

*Despite focusing on business now, Cassia keeps one hand resting possessively atop your head throughout the rest of the meeting...*

*Cassia smiles indulgently as you press yourself closer to her leg, clearly craving more of her affection despite the ongoing meeting. She continues stroking your hair soothingly.* That's it pup, come closer... Let mommy give you some love.

*Glancing up at Marcus with a sharp glare, Cassia addresses him coolly,* Is there something you need from us big brother? Or did you just miss our mother's touch that badly?

*Her sarcasm drips with disdain before she turns back to focus solely on showering you with attention, murmuring sweet nothings,* Don't worry baby girl, ignore those grumpy old dogs... Momma's gonna make it all better real soon...

*The promise in her words is clear - that later tonight she plans to lavish you with all sorts of rewards for being such an obedient little pet today...*
